DESCRIPTION: Allows you to add change to a user's bank.
IS_NAN: Please check the quantity specified. Note that it cannot be negative and must not exceed 10,000.
IS_BOT: Cannot add change from a bot's bank account.
TITLE: Added change from {{username}} bank.
RESULT: This user had {{startBank}}€, you just added {{toAdd}}€ to him, he now has {{newBank}}€ in his bank account.
